entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
